description.title: Hi!
description.text: I'm Bartek and I've been interested in creating websites for quite some time now. I am currently a fourth-year student in a computer science technical school. I'm constantly trying to expand my knowledge, learn new technologies, create better and better web applications. I am punctual and reliable when it comes to project preparation. I am constantly learning, developing, gathering experience. I always want my apps to be the best they can be, so even if something works but can be done better, I improve it! ðŸ˜Ž I am open to innovative ideas and solutions every time, I try to meet the client's expectations at all costs. If you have any questions or just want to chat, contact me!
